title: Calcination-induced enhancement of Cd2+ and Pb2+ electrochemical detection capabilities of nano-ag-supported CoZn bi-metal ZIFs
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,2061-2072
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00956D, Paper
Siyan Wang, Yangcan Zhao, Chengkai Xia, Wantong Zhu, Ying Hou, Xiangpeng Zeng, Hongyan Xu
The electrochemical properties of CoZn bi-metal ZIF were improved by calcination at high temperature. Ag@ZIF-1000 exhibited the best detection capabilities for Cd2+ and Pb2+ with a low limit of detection and high sensitivity.
